bibl.title: Freedom and its Limits in the Ancient World – Proceedings of a colloquium held at the Jagellonian University Kraków, September 2003
bibl.note: An analysis of the native anti-Greek revolts in Upper Egypt.
POLANSKI Tomasz, Oriens militans: Extreme Traditionalist Movements in the Provincial Populace of the Ptolemaic Egypt and Their Ideology.
Prace Archeologiczne 60 = Studies in Ancient Art and Civilization 9 = Studia ad Archaeologiam Mediterraneam pertinentia 20 (1999) pp. 23-48.
